Click images to enlarge Description Up for auction is this ESP LTD 2F-E Electric Guitar with Gig Bag. This is a pre-owned guitar that is in nice used condition! The guitar has a small chip by the bridge and the slot where the tremolo arm has a small piece missing, there is also a small dent by the input (pictured). The back plate on the guitar is not the original and does not come with clamping blocks for the nut. The back of the guitar has a faded signature, the signature is believed to be from Zak G from the band Cold. We do not have a way to authenticate this signature but you can see it in the pictures. The guitar features Seymour Duncan pickups with a TB4 in the bridge position and a SH-1N for the neck.
